mapper.select: SELECT insDte,time,RPM FROM mqttdata WHERE RPM NOT IN('','0');

SELECT CASE WHEN (#{period}='DATE') THEN DATE(insDte) WHEN (#{period}='MONTH') THEN MONTH(insDte) WHEN (#{period}='YEAR') THEN YEAR(insDte) END AS date, CASE WHEN (#{column}='speed') THEN ROUND(AVG(speed),2) WHEN (#{column}='mileage') THEN ROUND(AVG(fuel),2) WHEN (#{column}='distance') THEN ROUND(MAX(driving_distance + 0),2) WHEN (#{column}='tripDistance') THEN 'no data' WHEN (#{column}='idling') THEN 'no data' WHEN (#{column}='acceleration') THEN 'no data' WHEN (#{column}='deceleration') THEN 'no data' WHEN (#{column}='engineMisfire') THEN 'no data' END AS value FROM mqttdata GROUP BY date
